title: Replace CryptoCrew validator
summary: CryptoCrew Validators is an Austrian-based Web3 infrastructure provider specializing in secure, transparent validation, IBC relaying, and node services. Since 2021, we have secured over USD 40 million across 40+ interchain networks, facilitated millions of IBC transactions, and operate a global network of decentralized bare-metal servers with enterprise-grade security and monitoring. As a core protocol contributor, we maintain strategic partnerships with foundations and liquid staking protocols, support Interchain Security Solutions and onboarding for consumer chains, and have received an AAA rating as a Verified Staking Provider on stakingrewards.com: https://www.stakingrewards.com/provider/cryptocrew-validators.
